body:
I did a terrible lie back in old Avicus and MCZone, saying that I was 16, but... I'm actually 12.

Me:

Well, my name is Spritmage123 and I am a short little boy who is 12 and I'm turning 13 in 23rd of April.

I was born with a condition called Hemophilia and I was born in London, and I still am there. I've always been intrested in aviation, but I lost interest. I have experience with all kinds of programming languages, but I've mastered the arts of that basic language Scratch (that's my account), but I know fluent CSS, HTML, C#, C++, Visual Basic, Batch and Python and RoR.

Recently, I've decided what I'd like to do with my life... I want to be a Law Judge, y'know, them guys with them funny wigs who decide whether the defendant goes free or not? Yeah...

Anyway, here is my real self, I apologize for the lies. I'm sorry for the screwups, I'm starting anew and hoping to apply for Moderator!

Plus, I am soon getting a Debit Card, and I'm obviously going to obviously donate obviously to Avicus (obviously).

About my cat who broke her leg:

Well, she ain't dead... I thought she was. She has recovered without surgery and we gave her and her brother away to a friend.

Anyway, see ya around, I'm being more active now.

title: About me (For real this time)

replies.body:
very cool work and its pretty good that you have skills in all that computer techno stuff

judges dont really decide whether someone is proven guilty instead of dictating the fine or time spent in prison if the person is guilty. thats just a real simplistic run down because judges and law in general is super duper confusing and i dont want to go there.

gl on applying or being hand picked or whatever is happening with staff apps.

debit cards are pretty dank.

happy to hear about your cat
